STI.P: List of reference standards for qualified certificates for website authentication

NP.TXT: For qualified certificates for website authentication that are issued for use in transport layer security authentication outside the context of a web-browser:

ITEM.P: ETSI EN 319411-2 V2.6.1 (2025-06); these certificates shall be issued in accordance with the QNCP-w-gen certificate policy, with the QEVCP-w certificate policy, or with QNCP-w certificate policy, as specified in that standard; or

NP.TXT: For other qualified certificates for website authentication than those referred to in point 1, including within the context of a web-browser:
